name: Target Hunter
description:
Race against the clock in this first person shooter. Navigate through the arena to find and shoot targets before time runs out.

Features
  • Randomly generated targets
  • Space aesthetic
  • Jump and Time powerups
Keyboard Controls
  • WASD -- Move
  • Space -- Jump
  • Mouse 1 -- Fire
How To Play

Run and jump around the arena and shoot all of the targets before time runs out. You can collect jump power-ups to double your jump height and time power-ups to add 5 seconds to the clock.
